divs: Sighting Details1. I was on my back porch smoking. 2. I noticed a star moving 3. Satellite 5. I felt like showing someone:) 4. I watched for about five minutes after it stopped and stared shooting fireballs to the right then down then left repeatedly about 1 a second. I went back inside to look for binoculars. Could not find them after about ten minutes went back outside and continued to watch it shoot fireballs. 6. Lost sight when the sun started to come up.
Summary: star like object moved in the sky, stopped, then ejected fireballs?
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Bayfield
There were no other sightings in Bayfield on or around October 15th 2012
